definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: cage, prison (poss. loan-word from As. sûigaru, cage (Ba:NB 22); NH [[סוּגׇר]] dog-collar or chain = Syr. suwgro0 (clog of) dog-collar; whence Ar. sa0juwrun dog-collar (as loan-word), Frä:114 Prä:BAS i. 372);—[[וַיִּתְּנֻהוּ בַסּוּגַר]] Ez Eze 19:9 and they put him into a cage.
